cont.entity_a: Comfortable for use over hearing aids. Uncomfortable for long periods; too tight and causes sweating. Comfortable on large heads. Comfortable for long periods.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable but loose fitting; not suitable for exercise. Loose fit and easily falls off head. Comfortable fit but loose on small heads.

cont.entity_a: Sound quality is clear and good for interviews but not high fidelity. Audio is muddy and muffled without equalizer adjustment. Requires an amp for full sound quality at 160 ohms. Good sound quality with amp. Sound quality good, but cord can be inconvenient. Decent sound quality for the price. Good sound reproduction. Good sound quality but cord broke quickly.
cont.entity_b: Good for TV listening with clear sound. Sound quality is good for TV but not recommended for music. Static pops and clicks are an issue. Good sound quality but static issues when moving. Good sound quality with long range. Sound quality is crystal clear. Good sound quality but not noise cancelling.

cont.entity_a: Good deal for the money. Good price at $23.00. Decent sound quality for the price. Good value for money.
cont.entity_b: Sound quality is surprisingly good for the price.

cont.entity_a: Durability issues with plastic covering degrading over time. Not very sturdy; channel stopped working quickly. Hinge broke after 3 months of use. Straight plug is not durable. Durability issues with connectivity problems over time.
Heavy, bulky design with slightly muffled sound quality. Collapsible for easy transport. Bulky design with ok sound quality.

In-line volume control works well. Volume control on headphones without adjusting computer settings is a great feature. Volume control is helpful for adjusting sound levels. Cord is long and volume control works well. 8 ft cord with volume adjuster is a nice bonus.
cont.entity_b: Easy operation with physical switch and volume wheel. Separate phone volume from TV volume.

cont.entity_a: Suitable for piano practice but not recommended for computer or instrument use.
cont.entity_b: Difficult to set up with Samsung smart TV. Not compatible with modern Samsung TVs. Not compatible with new TVs.
Wireless technology is poor for office environments. Annoying static and volume shifts.

cont.entity_a: Too tight for large heads. Fit over ears well with good flex.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable fit but loose on small heads.
